text-content: So there is going to be a new season of Rick and Morty, Can’t wait for it. I bet it is going to awesome.
Do you like to drive fast? I don't, I think it is a bad thing to do and you should not put at risk other's lives.
My headphones are dying slowly, gotta find new one, I can’t live without music.
I love to win arguments, I enjoy it so much, but people get upset because of this and they sometimes avoid me.
So the other day I got flamed hard as hell in COD and do you know what was a reason? Being good…
One more stupid suggestion in this comments section and I will lose my mind for good.
